info.description:
## About

With the JUMINGO shipping API you can import your shipments into your JUMINGO account from any source.
The functionalities of the API include creating and updating shipment drafts, fetching suitable shipment rates for a given shipment and purchasing shipping labels.
Furthermore, you can retrieve tracking data and fetch shipping labels and documents for all your purchased shipments. 

The current main purpose of the API is to connect your account to e-commerce systems and marketplaces.

## General
The API is organized around REST. Our API has resource-oriented URLs and uses HTTP response codes to indicate API errors. We use built-in HTTP features, like HTTP authentication and HTTP verbs.
All API requests must be made over HTTPS. Calls made over plain HTTP will return errors.
Request data is passed to the API as JSON objects and JSON is also returned by all API responses, including errors, although our API SDKs convert requests and responses to appropriate language-specific objects.

Best practice usage of the API and business logic is described in the supplementary [integration guide](https://www.jumingo.com/cms/JUMiNGO_API-integration-guide.pdf "JUMiNGO API Integration Guide").

## Base URL
The base URL for all calls is: `https://api.jumingo.com/v1`

## HTTP status codes
HTTP response codes in the `2xx` range indicate success. Codes in the `4xx` range indicate an error on the client side (e.g. a required parameter is missing). Codes in the `5xx` range indicate an error with our servers. Each error should provide an error code and an error message with further information.

HTTP status code | Description
---------------- | -----------
200, 201, 204 - OK | Everything worked.
400 - Bad Request | The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter or a validation error.
401 - Unauthorized | No valid API key has been provided or your account is disabled.
403 - Forbidden | You are not allowed to talk to this endpoint. This can either be due to a wrong authentication or when you’re trying to reach an endpoint that your account isn’t allowed to access.
404 - Not Found | The requested resource doesn’t exist.
500, 502, 503, 504 - Server Errors | Something went wrong on our side. Please contact our support if you receive this error.

## Authentication
All API requests requires authentication. Unauthorized calls will return errors.

Authenticate by including your API key in the `X-AUTH-TOKEN` HTTP header of each API call, e.g.:

`X-AUTH-TOKEN: INSERT_YOUR_API_KEY`

You can find your API key in your JUMINGO user account. You can get access to the JUMiNGO customer API by enabling it in your [user account](https://www.jumingo.com/de-de/users/connections/create/8). After activation, you will get your personal API key.

## Date/Time Format
All values of type `string <date-time>` are defined in a specific [RFC 3339](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.6) format and must also be formatted accordingly for requests.

The format is: YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss

Example: 2018-07-26 15:54:13

All dates and times are specified in UTC (Coordinated Universal Time).
info.title: JUMINGO API Reference

post.summary: Get carrier aaccess points by an address with some radius in kilometers

countryCode.description: The country as ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code

street.description: The street name and building number

state.description: Abbreviation of the state; the state required only for US and Canada

radius.description: The radius in kilometers around the specified address

200.description: The Carrier aaccess points collection response

post.description: Get cart total costs with a description of the calculations

parameters.name: cart
parameters.description: The List of shipment id and voucher code

201.description: Total shipments cost with description of the calculation.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Connection resources.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page

post.description:
Creates a new connection.

**This API call is for e-commerce / shop plugin developers only.**

As a registered plugin developer, you have received additional, separate information for this call.
If you would like to create a new shop plugin, please contact our customer support for more information.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Order resources.

parameters.name: export
parameters.description: Use this parameter with value 1 to export data. For example: 1

parameters.name: paymentMethod[]
parameters.description: Filter by array of exact payment method names. For example: ["paypal", "sofort"]

parameters.name: paymentStatus
parameters.description: Filter by Payment status number. Use prefix 1 for unpaid and 0 for paid"

parameters.name: created[before]
parameters.description: Filter by created before the date and/or time. For example: "2020-09-19T00:00:00.000"

parameters.name: created[after]
parameters.description: Filter by created after the date and/or time.  For example: "2020-09-19T00:00:00.000"

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Full text search by data: - Shipping number - Tracking number - Pickup code - Sender address (return address) - Recipient address - Billing address - E-mail address (email_label_copy OR email_tracking)

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page, 10 by default

get.description: Gets a list of all shipments. You can filter and sort the shipments. The pagination is done by limit and offset parameters.

parameters.name: created[before]
parameters.description: Filter by created before the date and/or time. For example: "2020-09-19T00:00:00.000"

parameters.name: created[after]
parameters.description: Filter by created after the date and/or time.  For example: "2020-09-19T00:00:00.000"

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page

post.description:
Creates a new shipment.
If you are using an e-commerce connection, you must specify the order data with "connection_custom_data".

get.description: Get a specific shipment based on the given shipment ID.

post.description: Update shipments rate with cheapest tariff

post.summary: Uploads a commercial invoice or an export declaration for a shipment

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The document type for the shipment to be uploaded. E.g. commercial-invoice or export-declaration

delete.summary: Deletes a commercial invoice or an export declaration for a shipment

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The document type for the shipment to be deleted. E.g. commercial-invoice or export-declaration

post.summary: Returns shipment rates for a given shipment.

AccessPoints.description: Contains the data of the carrier access points.

city.description: City of the Carrier Access Point

street.description: The adress of the Carrier Access Point

postCode.description: Postal code of the Carrier Access Point

distance.description: The distance from selected location in request

items.description: The carrier Access Point hours of operation time

dayName.description: The day name in the current language.

workingHours.description: Range of working hours throughout the day

AccessPointsResponse.description: Contains the data of the carrier response.

items.example: postCode: This value should not be blank

standard_insurance_total.description: total of all standard insurance costs

standard_insurance_total_uvp.description: total of all uvp/original standard insurance costs if discount applies

premium_insurance_total.description: total of all premium insurance costs

premium_insurance_total_uvp.description: total of all uvp/original premium insurance costs if discount applies

export_declaration_total.description: total of all export declaration costs

export_declaration_total_uvp.description: total of all uvp/original export declaration costs if discount applies

shipping_costs_total_uvp.description: total of all uvp/original rate costs if discount applies

CartTotalCalculatorResult.description: Contains the data of the cart total calculator result.

CartTotalInput.description: Contains the List of shipment uuid and voucher code.

CartTotalOutput.description: Contains total and payment metods data

active.description: identifier whether connection active or not

syncPeriod.description: identifier whether connection active or not

sendTrackingMail.description: identifier whether send tracking email or not

deleted.description: identifier whether connection was deleted or not

items.description: The key of item is name of the date. For example: "LastSynced"

receiveWebhook.description: Is receive webhook enabled for connection

ConnectionCustomData.description:
Used to submit additional order data from e-commerce systems.
Contains the data of the order and one or more included items.
Required for shop / e-commerce connections, optional for API connections.

isCreationViaApiAllowed.description: Indicates whether the connection and shipments can only be created via api or via an account

isVisible.description: Indicates whether the connection in the account can be selected when creating a new one

isSyncable.description: Indicates whether the jumingo account can be synced with a button (ebay, amazon) or not (api, plugins)

showApiToken.description: Specifies whether the api token should be displayed (for api and shop plugins)

hasCreateForm.description: Indicates whether a connection is created via form or not (from external via shop plugin)

taxFree.description: Indicates that shipping from or to this country is VAT free

postCodeFree.description: Indicates that country does not have post codes

type_id.description: Connection type ID; please see external list of valid connection type IDs.

webhook_url.description: URL to which the webhooks should be sent

CreateConnection.description: Body for request to create a connection.

street.description: First address line (usually street name and house number)

street2.description: Second address line for further information

zip.description: Postal code of the address; is required if the country needs a postal code

connection_uuid.description: The ID of the connection to be used. Each connected e-commerce system has a Connection ID. An overview of the systems including the IDs can be found in your user account.

connection_item_uuid.description: Your individual item ID of the shipment. Mostly corresponds to the order number in your shop. Item IDs must be unique. Required for shop / e-commerce connections, optional for API connections.

validation_mode.description: This sets the validation mode. In strict mode, each validation error (e.g. more characters than allowed) results in an error response. In lax mode, the shipment is created despite validation errors. Incorrect values are removed or shortened accordingly. The lax validation mode is intended to be able to safely import the shipments from e-commerce systems and to complete them afterwards.

value_amount.description: Goods value of the consignment; needed for the customs

content_description.description: Description of the contents of the package(s); needed for the customs

reference_number.description: A reference text that you can use to identify your shipment, e.g. an order number of your merchandise management system. Will be printed on the shipping label in most cases.

email.description: If specified, after the order has been placed, an email will be use for user registration

email_tracking.description: If specified, after the order has been placed, an email will be sent to this email address with the tracking link

email_label_copy.description: If specified, after the order has been placed, an additional email with the shipping label will be sent to this email address

extra_insurance_type.description: Type of insurance. Possible values: standard | premium

export_license.description: Indicate if you need an export license and want to buy it along with the shipment

hs_tariff_number.description: Hs number for import/export goods defining the type of the good for customs.

weight.description: Weight of the package in kg

length.description: Length of the package in cm

width.description: Width of the package in cm

height.description: Height of the package in cm

shipping_type.description: The shipping type indicates whether the shipment must be delivered in a shop or picked up by a driver.

pickup_date.description: The date for which the collection was arranged.

pickup_min_time.description: The earliest time at which the shipment is picked up.

pickup_max_time.description: The latest time by which the shipment is picked up.

message.example: Required value for "name" is missing (empty value is not allowed).

Error.description: An error code and an error message with further information are provided.

ErrorResponse.description: Every error response should contain an error object.

detail.example: No result was found for query although at least one row was expected

paypalPuiReferenceNumber.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) reference number

paypalPuiBankName.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) Bank name

paypalPuiAccountHolderName.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) holder name

paypalPuiInternationalBankAccountNumber.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) Banck number

paypalPuiBankIdentifierCode.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) Banck number

paypalPuiPaymentDueDate.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) due date

cancelOrderLink.description: FYQ link with info how to cansel order

hadOrderBefore.description: It is true if this user has paid orders except current

paypalPuiReferenceNumber.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) reference number

paypalPuiBankName.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) Bank name

paypalPuiAccountHolderName.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) holder name

paypalPuiInternationalBankAccountNumber.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) Banck number

paypalPuiBankIdentifierCode.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) Banck number

paypalPuiPaymentDueDate.description: PayPal Pay upon Invoice (PUI) due date

cancelOrderLink.description: FYQ link with info how to cansel order

items.description: The key of item is name of the date. For example: "created" or "paymentDate"

description.example: Ein normaler quaderförmiger Karton, der stapelbar ist.

PackagingType.description: Specifies the type of packaging of the packages

id.description: The unique ID of the shipment

customer_personal_name.description: Your personal name, it's allowed only if you are a team member

last_modified.description: Date on which the shipment was last modified

status.description: The processing status of the shipment

source.description: The data source of the shipment

dates_in_the_past.description: Is pickup or delivery dates in the past according country timezones.

use_commercial_invoice.description: An indicator that shows whether to use a commercial invoice or a proforma invoice

picked_up.description: The parcel had not been collected successfully during the initial pickup time frame.

update_ordered_delivery_address_allowed.description: Parameter to show can we update delivery address for an already ordered shipment or not

pickup_status.description: Statuses for a new pickup: '0' - default status; '1' - 'schedule a new pickup' email has been sent; '2' - second pickup scheduled; '3' - support email after failed second pickup has been sent;

street.description: First address line (usually street name and house number)

street2.description: Second address line for further information

shippingType.description: The shipping type indicates whether the shipment must be delivered in a shop or picked up by a driver.

pickupDate.description: The date for which the collection was arranged.

connection_uuid.description: The ID of the connection used to create the shipment.

connection_item_uuid.description: Your individual item ID of the shipment. Mostly corresponds to the order number in your shop.

value_amount.description: Goods value of the consignment; needed for the customs

content_description.description: Description of the contents of the package(s); needed for the customs

reference_number.description: A reference text that you can use to identify your shipment, e.g. an order number of your merchandise management system. Will be printed on the shipping label in most cases.

email.description: Is always the email address of your customer account

email_tracking.description: If specified, after the order has been placed, an email will be sent to this email address with the tracking link

email_label_copy.description: If specified, after the order has been placed, an additional email with the shipping label will be sent to this email address

extra_insurance_price_netto.description: Amount of extra insurance value netto

extra_insurance_price_brutto.description: Amount of extra insurance value brutto

export_license.description: Indicate if you need an export license and want to buy it along with the shipment

extra_insurance_type.description: Type of insurance. Possible values: standard | premium

export_license_price_brutto.description: Amount of extra license price brutto

shipment_order_number_short.description: Shipment order number (only after the order has been placed)

shipment_order_number.description: Order number (only after the order has been placed)

hs_tariff_number.description: Hs number for import/export goods defining the type of the good for customs.

weight.description: Weight of the package in kg

length.description: Length of the package in cm

width.description: Width of the package in cm

height.description: Height of the package in cm

girth.description: Girth of the package in cm

first_length.description: Longest side of the package in cm

second_length.description: Second longest side of the package in cm

ShipmentPickupDateMode.description: Mode of pickup date. Default is 'flex'. Use 'exact' in combination with a pickupDate to filter only rates that can still be picked up on this day.

shipping_type.description: The shipping type indicates whether the shipment must be delivered in a shop or picked up by a driver.

transit_time_range_days.description: Specifies the minimum and maximum delivery time in working days that the shipment is expected to be on its way.

max_included_liability_amount.description: The maximum included liability amount of this rate

printer_required.description: Indicates whether a printer is required to print the shipping label.

company_only.description: A commercial pick-up address is required for this rate.

tax_free.description: Indicates whether the shipment is tax-free

pickup_date.description: The date for which the collection was arranged.

pickup_min_time.description: The earliest time at which the shipment is picked up.

pickup_max_time.description: The latest time by which the shipment is picked up.

pickup_reference_number.description: A reference number with which the collection can be checked.

durationFormatted.description: A formatted duration description with translation

ShipmentRate.description: The shipment rate object is only available if a tariff has been selected.

shipmentId.description: The unique ID of the shipment

options.description:
Filter rates based on specific service options.
Available options are:
| ID | Description                           | 
| ---| --------------------------------------|
| 1  | No printer                            |
| 3  | Pickup still today                    |
| 4  | Flexible pickup time                  |
| 5  | Delivery to a private address possible|
| 6  | Extra insurance possible              |

packageTypes.description:
Filter rates by the supported packaging type.
Available options are:
| ID | Description         | 
| ---| --------------------|
| 1  | Document            |
| 7  | Parcel              |
| 9  | Bulky goods         |
| 10 | Pallet              |
| 11 | Tire                |
| 14 | Suitcase            |
| 15 | Non-stackable pallet|

priceMax.description: Filter rates that are <= the specified maximum price

shipperGroups.description: Only return tariffs of a specific carrier. Any shipment rates call returns the full list of carrier ids that are currently available at JUMiNGO.

shippingType.description: The shipping type indicates whether the shipment must be dropped-off in a parcel shop or if it is picked up by a driver. Select 1 to receive only pickup rates and 2 to only receive drop-off rates.

tariffTypes.description: Only return specific services such as Standard (1), Express (2), Same Day (4) or Economy (5) rates.

pickupDate.description: The date on which the shipment is to be sent.

packagingTypeId.description:
Package type id
| ID | Description         | 
| ---| --------------------|
| 1  | Document            |
| 7  | Parcel              |
| 9  | Bulky goods         |
| 10 | Pallet              |
| 11 | Tire                |
| 14 | Suitcase            |
| 15 | Non-stackable pallet|

mode.description:
Setting modes for shipment tariff. 
Use 'm' for a regular call to fetch rates. This will return the same results as the shipping cost calculation on the JUMiNGO homepage.
Use 'a' to get available Same Day rates.
Use 'single' to fetch data about a single tariff. If used, tariffID needs to be set in the request as well.

shipperGroups.description: Map of shipper groups keyed by index

icon.description: Should be used insted of name if not empty

permanent.description: Is filter permanent or not. Related to mobile view

extended.description: Is filter extended or not. Related to extended or short scc view

taxFree.description: If the tax applicable, this property will equal false.

tax.description: The tax description. If taxFree equals true, this property will equal null.

packageAll.description: If provided more than one packages and should show the word "all", this property will equal true.

package.description: The packages description. If it did not provide any package, this property would equal null.

weight.description: Weight of the package in kg

length.description: Length of the package in cm

width.description: Width of the package in cm

height.description: Height of the package in cm

State.description: Abbreviation of the state; the state is required only for US and Canada.

StateCode.description: Abbreviation of the state; the state is required only for US and Canada.

days.description: Days range for delivery or hours

daysString.description: A full description of days units with translation

daysStringShort.description: A short description of days units with translation

modified.description: Date on which the tracker was last modified

last_updated.description: Date on which the tracker information was last updated

type.description: The type of tracking information. The text comes directly from the respective carrier. This is usually a free text, which is very different depending on the carrier. As a rule, one cannot rely on the expressiveness of the texts; in addition, the texts could be changed by the carrier at any time. Please always read the actual tracking status from the ShipmentTracking's status field.
type.example: The shipment has been dropped off and is now at a ups access point.

location.description: The location of the scan. The text comes directly from the respective carrier. The format and information density varies considerably depending on the carrier and region. Mostly the country code is included, sometimes also the city.
